original_text: This they said, tempting him, that they might have to accuse him. But Jesus stooped down, and with his finger wrote on the ground, as though he heard them not.
korean_text: 그들이 이렇게 말함은 고발할 조건을 얻고자 하여 예수를 시험함이러라 예수께서 몸을 굽히사 손가락으로 땅에 쓰시니

sentences.original_text: that they might have to accuse him
and with his finger wrote on the ground
as though he heard them not
sentences.korean_translation: 마치 그들의 말을 듣지 못하는 것처럼 하셨더라
